author: bluk
msg: Change mediatype with a charset for text providers
This takes into account the Accept-Charset
whenever possible.
See [WINK-270]

author: bluk
msg: Code formatting changes

author: hboutemy
msg: [MPMD-83] use project.reporting.outputEncoding encoding for non-HTML reports

author: bluk
msg: Fix an ordering problem in the AcceptCharset
ISO-8859-1 should be ordered first in various
cases for Accept-Charset header.  q-value = 1.0
This only occurs if no wildcard is in the
Accept-Charset.
See HTTP spec for complicated rules.

author: gstein
msg: Rejigger a bunch of code in adm_ops.c, primarily concentrating on add4. Of
particular import is making a copy of tweak_entries() (to post_add_work).
tweak_entries is intended for post-update cleanup, meaning it should be
manipulating nodes in the BASE tree, while post-add work requires
manipulation of WORKING nodes.
Much of this code is pretty garbaged by the way copy.c copys (incorrect)
meatadata along with the content.
Removed the public svn_wc_get_ancestry2() function, as nobody uses it. We
will most likely have better ways in the future for fetching node data.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c:
(tweak_entries): remove the REMOVE_MISSING_DIRS parameter, and code it
for the TRUE case. adjust params in recursion.
(post_add_work): copy of tweak_entries, with REMOVE_MISSING_DIRS
omitted, assuming it is FALSE. as a result, the NOTIFY params are no
longer needed, and NEW_REV and EXCLUDE_PATHS were not needed for
post-add work, so eliminate these params in the copied code.
(svn_wc__do_update_cleanup): remove the REMOVE_MISSING_DIRS param, and
adjust call to tweak_entries
(svn_wc_process_committed_queue2): use iterpool for a couple
scratch_pool parameters to optimize overall memory usage
(mark_tree_deleted): use iterpool where we can
(erase_from_wc): rename localvar to DB_KIND. proactively toss the
iterpool before one of the exit branches.
(svn_wc_get_ancestry2): removed.
(mark_item_copied): clear the DAV cache on the node
(mark_tree_copied): use an iterpool in one place, and don't worry about
the DAV cache, as mark_item_copied handles it now. simplify parens and
logic in an if-condition.
(svn_wc_add4): convert the on-disk type to the new DB kind, rather than
new to old, for the comparison. fix a call to __get_entry() to allow a
NULL return (allow_unversioned). remove the access baton extension
from this function -- access batons are no longer used by the client.
the compat functions will take care of this, however. tweak the logic
around entry_modify2() (check modify_flags first) for some upcoming
work that was omitted from this revision. fix up the DEPTH param and
call post_add_work() rather than do_update_cleanup.
* subversion/include/svn_wc.h:
(svn_wc_get_ancestry2): removed
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.h:
(svn_wc__do_update_cleanup): remove REMOVE_MISSING_DIRS param
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c:
(close_edit): adjust call to do_update_cleanup
